title: Latest updates: Leicestershire Live on Friday 24 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: armed robbery at shepshed building society .
work begins on great central railway bridge .
shakespeare nominated for manager of the month .
cole and youngs return for tigers at saints .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 monday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return on monday from 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : cold night but pleasant weekend
text: a cold and clear night with temperatures falling to 2c ( 36f ) .
tomorrow some early mist and fog is possible for a time however this will lift and clear leaving a beautiful day with blue sky and sunshine throughout .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

text: thanks to bbc weather watcher scrappy for this regal looking swan on the river soar at kegworth .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: preview : northampton saints vs. leicester tigers
text: england six nations winners ben youngs ( and dan cole return for leicester .
mathew tait , freddie burns , ellis genge and graham kitchener are the only four tigers to retain their places from the side that started the .
anglo-welsh cup final victory over exeter .
last sunday .
england centre luther burrell is on is on the bench for northampton saints after .
eight weeks out injured .
saints welcome back dylan hartley , courtney lawes , tom wood and george north after international duty .
derby day tomorrow ! !
# eastmidlandsclash # norvlei
get a good night 's sleep neighbour , see you there # tigersontour
gutted to miss it but on well earned safari break in masai mara !
# seenlionsbutnotigers # tigerfamily
you know what you have to do # tigersontour
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: leicester street reopens after 'sus package ' alert
text: the cordon has come down and humberstone gate has reopened .
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: armed robbery with 'shotgun ' in shepshed
text: there has been an armed robbery at the nottingham building society in shepshed this afternoon .
two men entered the building with their faces covered and threatened staff and customers with what is being described as a shotgun , leicestershire police said .
no-one was injured , but a quantity of cash was taken , the force added .
we are supporting police with enquiries following a robbery at our shepshed branch today and can confirm no-one was hurt in the incident .
oh dear hope they catch those responsible
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby : tigers 'know what is coming ' at northampton
text: outgoing leicester tigers head coach aaron mauger ( has said the squad are `` really excited '' about the pursuit of a premiership play-off place .
mauger takes charge of his final game in charge of tigers at northampton tomorrow , knowing a win or draw could take them into the top four .
`` it is always a big battle with saints , '' ex-new zealand centre mauger said .
`` they have n't played for a couple of weeks , so they will be fresh and up for it .
`` we are on a six-day turnaround and the high of winning the anglo-welsh cup last sunday , but we 've managed the squad through this period .
our guys know what is coming , but we are really excited by the challenge . ''
australian matt o'connor is taking over from mauger as head coach after the northampton game .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicestershire police sends floral tribute to pc killed in terror attack

documents.title: 'sus package ' cause of city centre police cordon
text: no sense of urgency or pressure among the fire or police officers i have to say and the cordon remains within 50m of the bank .
i 've just had confirmation from a police officer on the scene that a `` sus package '' was the reason for the evacuation .
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: leicester police cordon over 'contents of package '
text: the cordon has been put in place because of concerns about the contents of a package , according to leicestershire police .
the package was received by one of the humberstone gate businesses earlier today .
the force added that no-one has been injured .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: shops evacuated and police cordon in place in leicester
text: radio leicester 's ian stringer has just sent this from humberstone gate in the city centre .
he has said he has seen firefighters in breathing apparatus go into barclays bank .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bosses 'feeling fantastic ' at start of heritage railway bridge
text: andy munro , the chief executive of the great central railway , has said he is thrilled to finally have work underway on a new bridge ( see 10:11 ) to connect part of the heritage railway .
once complete , the 30-metre structure will carry a single track of the railway over the main line between derby and london st pancras .
`` it feels absolutely fantastic , '' mr munro said .
`` we ca n't believe that finally after all this time , after all this work from so many people , we are standing here and work has started to put the bridge in place . ''
`` it is fantastic . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : pleasant afternoon ahead
text: cloud will clear and there should be plenty of blue sky and sunshine around this afternoon .
highs of 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: travel : one lane closed on m1 near east midlands airport
text: a broken down vehicle on the m1 northbound is causing congestion between junction 24 and 23a near east midlands airport .
one of the four lanes is currently closed .
here 's how it 's looking like at the moment
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: police and crime commissioner sets out plans for leicestershire
text: leicestershire police and crime commissioner lord willy bach has promised to work more closely with victims and the community and try to give people `` value for money '' policing .
lord bach made the comments at the launch of his first complete police and crime plan in leicester .
`` we have suffered a lot as a police force as a result of government cuts over the last eight or nine years , '' he told bbc radio leicester .
`` we 've lost 23 % of police officers across leicestershire as you know and we 've lost 30 % of resource from central government . ''
lord bach added that he hoped the rise in council tax would help him deliver on his promises .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

text: leicester tigers welcome back england duo dan cole and ben youngs into the starting lineup for tomorrow 's premiership derby with northampton saints ( 15:00 ) .

maxime mermoz 11 .

ben youngs 1 .
ellis genge 2 .

dan cole 4 .
dom barrow 5 .
graham kitchener 6 .
mike fitzgerald 7 .
brendon o'connor 8 .
luke hamilton

BBC Radio Leicester sport

documents.title: craig shakespeare nominated for manager of the month
text: leicester city boss craig shakespeare has been nominated for the premier league manager of the month award for march .
shakespeare has gone unbeaten as foxes boss since taking over from claudio ranieri and has won league matches against liverpool , hull and west ham .
sam allardyce , antonio conte , mauricio pochettino , eddie howe and jurgen klopp are the other nominees .
you can cast your vote for shakespeare to win the award here .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : train delays on four routes
text: east midlands trains say there 's been a failure of the electricity supply at the doncaster signal box , which is causing problems :
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: work begins on great central railway bridge
text: work has begun on a bridge that will one day carry heritage steam trains over the midland mainline .
the 30-metre structure ( artist 's impression above ) , which should be completed by the autumn , is part of the wider restoration of the great central railway .
the railway line , between leicester and nottingham , was left with a 500m gap after infrastructure , including bridges , were removed .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ex-city boss claudio ranieri to get 'golden bench ' award
text: claudio ranieri will get a special award from the italian football federation for leading leicester city to a shock premier league title last season .
the 65-year-old italian was .
sacked in february .
with the club in a relegation battle .
he will receive a panchina d'oro ( golden bench ) award next week .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather outlook
text: here is your friday weather forecast
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: shares in next rise despite fall in profits
text: do n't worry if those share figures mean nothing to you - i think the majority of us are in the same boat
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicester-based next shares leads ftse 100 higher
text: london 's main share index gained ground on thursday led by retailer leicester-based retailer next , as investors reacted to its results .
the .
ftse 100. index ended the day 15.99 points or 0.22 % ahead at 7,340.71 .
next shares jumped by 8 % despite the retailer reporting its .
first fall in annual profits for eight years , with profits dropping to £ 790m .
`` not a pretty set of figures from next but no worse than expected after warning on profits in january , '' said neil wilson at etx capital .
`` investors seem to be reassured that it 's taking steps to turn things around with a focus on core products . ''
author: BBC Business News

documents.title: bid to boost golf participation among women in leicestershire
text: england golf want more women across leicestershire to get into playing the sport .
leicestershire is one of just a handful of counties offering free taster sessions for five to 18-year-old girls in an attempt to boost participation .
it is all part of the get into golf campaign .
anita higginson , ( far right ) president of the county 's women 's golf association , said : `` at kibworth , and actually nationally , we are outnumbered by men five to one .
`` that is really why england golf are encouraging more women to play .
`` there are some many more opportunities now , it is a hobby like no other where you can grow old playing it and that is one of the wonderful things . ''
author: BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: rugby : tigers 'pumped ' for saints clash
text: leicester tigers winger tom brady has said the squad are in no doubt about the importance of tomorrow 's midlands derby with northampton saints .
both tigers and saints are still in the .
hunt for the final premiership play-off place .
the former sale sharks winger said : `` it does not take too much motivating , the lads are already pumped for it .
`` leicester versus northampton is embedded in you when you come to this club .
it goes unsaid - it is a must win game for this club . ''
aaron mauger names his final tigers side at lunchtime .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : march across leicestershire
text: it looks as if it has been a dramatic start to the day in the skies above east midlands airport .
thanks to bbc weather watcher loki 's keeper for being up nice and early to take the snap .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to friday across leicestershire .
i 'll be with you until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you are doing anything for red nose day then please get in touch via facebook , twitter or email and i 'll share some of the best and stories .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
